snippet: MEOS Q3 2025: Demand for RevOps Analysts increased by 18% year-over-year. Key drivers: SQL and CRM Data Modeling.
MEOS Q3 2025: CX Insights demand is stable globally, moderate growth in data storytelling and visualization roles.
MEOS Q3 2025: CRM Analyst roles expanding in North America and APAC, particularly Salesforce-related governance.
